name: v1.1.0 - Adjustable Target Weight
body:
## What's New

### âœ¨ Features
- **Adjustable Target Weight**: You can now set your own target weight in Settings (60-120 kg range)
- **Dynamic Quarter Goals**: Quarter goals automatically recalculate based on your target weight
- **Live Updates**: All progress bars and displays update immediately when you change the target

### ğŸ”§ Improvements
- Added auto-updater functionality for future releases
- Version bumped to 1.1.0

### ğŸ“ Notes
This release includes the auto-updater. Future updates will install automatically!
